comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Edward Trowbridge Collins, Sr. (May 2, 1887 – March 25, 1951), nicknamed "Cocky", was an American Major League Baseball second baseman, manager and executive. He played from 1906 to 1930 for the Philadelphia Athletics and Chicago White Sox. Also: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/trialsanderrors/2797562852/]
